content.query:
CREATE  or ALTER view [dbo].[vw_dim_Date] AS 
SELECT 
    idFechas AS idDate,
    ClaveFecha AS dateKey,
    Fecha AS date,
    Mes AS month,
    NumeroMes AS monthNumber,
    Ano AS year,
    NumeroSemana AS weekNumber,
    DiaSemana AS dayWeek,
    NumeroDiaSemana AS dayWeekNumber,
    DiaAno AS yearDay,
    Trimestre AS quarter,
    Cuatrimestre AS quadrimester,
    CASE WHEN Cuatrimestre IN (1,2) THEN 1
         WHEN Cuatrimestre IN (2,4) THEN 2
         ELSE -1 END AS semester,
    fechaCarga AS loadDate,
    fechaDelta AS deltaDate
FROM 
    [default].dbo.fechas
